name: MultiplayerCustomLobbies
description: Customize the interface of multiplayer lobbies.
Joining will only work if the "join after game starts" setting is enabled, as the game automatically starts after joining a lobby.

eventsFunctions.description: Return true if game run in preview.
eventsFunctions.name: IsPreview

eventsFunctions.description: Define a shape painter as a mask of an object.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Mask an object with a shape painter
eventsFunctions.name: MaskWithShapePainter

parameters.description: Shape painter to use as a mask
parameters.name: Mask

eventsBasedObjects.description:
Customize the interface of multiplayer lobbies.

Joining will only work if the "join after game starts" setting is enabled, as the game automatically starts after joining a lobby.
eventsBasedObjects.name: CustomLobbies

events.comment: Detect the margin from Lobby instances positions.
Shape painters are faster than sprites for masking, especially when only a rectangle is drawn.
The wait is to avoid a flash because of a 1-frame delay of Anchor behavior on child-objects.

eventsFunctions.name: SetPlayersCount
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set players in lobby count _PARAM0_, players in lobby: _PARAM1_, max players _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Return true if lobby is full.
eventsFunctions.name: IsFull
